//: This is an example of configuration file for web instance
It is not needed when using metrics as GitHub action
List of authorized users, leave empty for unrestricted
Cached time for generated images, 0 to disable
Maximum number of users, 0 for unlimited
Rate limiter (see express-rate-limit documentation for options)
Number of repositories to use to compute metrics

templates.//: Enabled templates, leave empty to enable all templates

traffic.//: Traffic plugin (GitHub API token must be RW for this to work)
Enable or disable repositories total page views is last two weeks

lines.//: Enable or disable repositories total lines added/removed

habits.//: Enable or disable coding habits metrics
Number of activity events to base habits on (up to 1000)

languages.//: Enable or disable most used languages metrics

followup.//: Enable or disable owned repositories issues and pull requests metrics

music.//: Enable or disable music recently played / random track from playlist
Music provider token (may be required depending on provider)

topics.//: Enable or disable starred topics display

projects.//: Enable or disable personal projects display

tweets.//: Enable or disable recent tweets display

stars.//: Enable or disable recently starred repositories display

stargazers.//: Enable or disable stargazers charts display

activity.//: Enable or disable recent activity display
